title: Date formatting
summary: Format dates with thread-safe, immutable DateTimeFormatter.
explanation: DateTimeFormatter is immutable and thread-safe, unlike SimpleDateFormat. It can be stored as a constant and shared. Predefined formatters like ISO_LOCAL_DATE are available for common formats.

whyModernWins.title: Thread-safe
whyModernWins.desc: Share formatters across threads without synchronization.

whyModernWins.title: Built-in formats
whyModernWins.desc: ISO_LOCAL_DATE, ISO_INSTANT, etc. for standard formats.

whyModernWins.title: Immutable
whyModernWins.desc: Store as static final constants safely.
